header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced full-stack software engineer with 6+ years developing scalable distributed systems, data platforms, and web applications. Proven track record building microservices, blockchain platforms, and event-driven architectures using modern technologies including Scala, Java, C#, AWS, and React. Strong expertise in data streaming, schema management, and both SQL and NoSQL databases.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Engineer on data platform team providing schema registry and AWS Kinesis integration libraries supporting content metadata, financial, experimentation, and telemetry use-cases across Disney+ and Hulu
Built stream snapshot system allowing teams to maintain state from AWS Kinesis streams using functional state management patterns in Scala
Migrated event schemas from OpenAPI to AWS Smithy with comprehensive compatibility validation and semantic versioning
Developed multi-language artifact publishing pipeline supporting Scala, Java, Python, and Protobuf with automated JSON serialization using Circe, Jsoniter, and custom Python encoders
Implemented Spark jobs for Databricks data lake integration using Deltalake format with S3 storage for analytics dashboards
Built complex CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for schema validation and artifact deployment

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Core developer on proof-of-stake blockchain platform for supply chain verification and ethical business tracking
Built distributed node network using Akka actors with TCP communication and HTTP API for node management and transaction signing
Developed transaction streaming client using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with Protobuf API for real-time transaction indexing
Created React proof-of-concept UI demonstrating transaction streaming integration for client applications

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Full-stack developer on construction project management web application handling submittals, RFIs, and change orders
Architected cutting-edge Event Sourced change management system with state derived from event streams, integrated with enterprise resource management application
Built end-to-end features across C# .NET microservices, MSSQL and Event Store databases, and web UI components deployed on Azure
Implemented sophisticated change order tracking system with cross-entity referencing and real-time synchronization

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Developed comprehensive test automation framework enabling non-technical team members to write API and UI tests using simple C# code
Built Selenium-based UI testing framework with XPath targeting for headless and browser-based test execution
Executed performance testing suites and bulk operations to ensure application responsiveness and scalability
Performed manual testing including test case development, execution, and continuous improvement processes
